name: Destroy Planet Earth
description:
Destroy Planet Earth is a third person space shooter in which the players finds themselves to be an AI from an alien civilization. 

The greedy humans thirst for new technology in their conquests. They have stolen our tech and have their so called "scientists" working on cracking it. We can not let that happen and it is up to YOU to insure it doesn't.

As one of the council's more advanced AI, you will be able to hack yourself into any tech of ours, including connecting to your Mothership. She will be the destruction of Earth. Fight your way to her and use her to Destroy Planet Earth!

CREDITS:

Ashwani Aggarwal

Tyler Brandt

Christopher Button
